page.title: 18Model manufacturing
page.content: Control Model Systems is a small business manufacturing coin-operated models of cars, boats and trucks. The equipment is operated from a micro-processor based comman centre which can control up to 24 player positions. The skill factor is sufficient to encourage repeated playing. The firm also offers advice on layout, and designs construction drawings. The models range in size from 64 inches down to 21 inches and are very versatile, some even climbing slopes, and have great play appeal. Systems are installed widely overseas. The firm operates from a small workshop and office.
